CustomField.description: If checked, the Contact can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact_Role__c, "Owner"), ISPICKVAL(Contact_Role__c, "Billing Manager") ), TRUE, FALSE ) && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "SE_Contact",RecordType.DeveloperName = "FI_Contact") && NOT(ISNULL(Account.ON_LastUpsert__c)) && Account.ON_Upsertable__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Contact can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.label: Connector: Upsertable
